{# Display humanitarian needs as a multiple infoboxes. Uses the humanitarian_needs variable populated by hapi-brief.js. If the sector_code variable is set, shows only needs for that sector (if available); otherwise uses Intersectoral by default. Generate a separate infobox for affected, in need, and targeted (as available). The key figure is the total people in need. Supplemental figures are broken down by all of the categories supplied by HPC Tools. FIXME: if we go back to gender/age disaggregation, this will need to be rewritten. #} {% if sector %} {% set sector_code = sector.code %} {% else %} {% set sector_code = 'Intersectoral' %} {% endif %} {# filter to only the rows for the sector we've chosen (possibly Intersectoral) #} {% set filtered_pin = humanitarian_needs.data.withRows("sector_code", sector_code).cache() %} {% if filtered_pin.length() > 0 %} {# Iterate through the different statuses, and create a separate infobox for each (if available) #} {% for status in [["AFF", "People affected"], ["INN", "People in need"], ["TGT", "Targeted for assistance"]] %} {% set pin_date = filtered_pin.max("reference_period_end") %} {% set latest_pin = filtered_pin.withRows("population_status", status[0]).withRows("reference_period_end", pin_date).cache() %} {% if latest_pin.length() > 0 %}
{{ status[1] }} {% if "total" in latest_pin.values("category") %} {% set n=latest_pin.withRows("category", "total").last().population %} {% elseif "" in latest_pin.values("category") %} {% set n=latest_pin.withRows("category", "").last().population %} {% endif %} {% if n %} {% include "templates/includes/key-figure.template.html" %} {% endif %}
{% for category in latest_pin.values("category") %} {% set population = latest_pin.withRows("category", category).last().population %} {% if category not in ["", "total"] and population > 0 %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
{{ category }} {% set n=population %} {% include "templates/includes/supplemental-figure.template.html" %}
{% if sector_code == 'Intersectoral' %} data {% else %} data {% endif %} | {{ pin_date | truncate(7, true, "") }}
{{ humanitarian_needs.sources | join(", ") }}
{% endif %} {% endfor %} {% endif %}
